current_symptoms.description: Describe any symptoms you are currently experiencing

respiratory_symptoms.shortness_of_breath: Moderate to severe, especially with exertion. Difficulty walking more than 100 yards without rest.
respiratory_symptoms.coughing: Daily productive cough, worse in mornings. Coughing fits 4-5 times per day.
respiratory_symptoms.wheezing: Frequent wheezing, present daily, worse at night
respiratory_symptoms.chest_tightness: Constant mild tightness, becomes severe during exacerbations
respiratory_symptoms.sputum_production: Daily, thick yellowish-green sputum, approximately 2 tablespoons per day

general_symptoms.fatigue: Significant fatigue, limits daily activities. Needs rest periods throughout day.
general_symptoms.fever: No current fever, had low-grade fever 2 weeks ago
general_symptoms.weight_changes: Unintentional weight loss of 8 lbs in past 6 months
general_symptoms.sleep_quality: Poor - wakes 3-4 times per night due to breathing difficulty

pain_assessment.description: Rate your pain levels and describe location

functional_status.description: Rate your ability to perform daily activities
functional_status.walking_distance: Limited to 100-150 yards before needing rest
functional_status.stair_climbing: Can climb half flight with multiple stops, severe breathlessness
functional_status.self_care_activities: Needs assistance with bathing and dressing on bad days
functional_status.work_status: Retired on disability, unable to work
functional_status.exercise_tolerance: Very limited - uses portable oxygen concentrator for any activity

quality_of_life.description: Rate how your condition affects your daily life
quality_of_life.physical_limitations: Severe - cannot perform most household tasks without assistance
quality_of_life.emotional_wellbeing: Moderate anxiety and depression related to disease progression
quality_of_life.social_activities: Significantly reduced - rarely leaves home due to mobility issues
quality_of_life.sleep_quality: Poor - wakes frequently, uses 3 pillows to sleep semi-upright

environmental_exposures.occupational_exposures: Previously worked in textile factory for 20 years, exposed to lint and chemicals

environmental_exposures.air_quality_concerns: Very sensitive to air quality, stays indoors on poor air quality days
environmental_exposures.recent_travel: Unable to travel due to oxygen dependence

compliance.oxygen_usage: Uses oxygen 16 hours per day at 2-3 L/min, as prescribed
compliance.pulmonary_rehabilitation: Completed program 6 months ago, trying to maintain home exercises
compliance.dietary_restrictions: Following low-sodium diet, trying to increase protein intake

recent_procedures.result: Hyperinflation consistent with COPD, no acute infiltrates
